title: What to know about COVID-19 vaccine side effects
description: Though the vaccine itself cannot give you the virus, you may experience some side effects after your vaccination.
cleaned_text: If you have reached this screen, your current device or browser is unable to access the full Edward-Elmhurst Health Web site.
